doc.after: The Bing Search gadget is a Windows Sidebar Gadget that uses Bing Search to fetch the user s search results and render them directly in the gadget Another gadget the Bing Maps gadget displays real time traffic conditions using Bing Maps 42 The gadget provides shortcuts to driving directions local search and full screen traffic view of major US and Canadian cities including Atlanta Boston Chicago Denver Detroit Houston Los Angeles Milwaukee Montreal New York City Oklahoma City Ottawa Philadelphia Phoenix Pittsburgh Portland Providence Sacramento Salt Lake City San Diego San Francisco Seattle St Louis Tampa Toronto Vancouver and Washington D C
